channel.title: New Scout opens possibility for new Unseen strategy
channel.description:
I've only done this twice, so I have no idea if it's a good strategy, but it's interesting because it wasn't possible before this latest patch. Basically the Mastermind just uses Foresight first so that if it alerts a scout, the guy gets executed under suspicion of being either death immune or converted.
Thoughts?
**UPDATE:** After trying this a few times I realized this is never a good strategy. Since converting someone and having them accuse someone else of having been visited by Unseen accomplishes the same thing and more.

item.title: New Scout opens possibility for new Unseen strategy
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

But that never happens

Could be nice to use it, makes them ‘confirmed’ BD.

Read full topic
